categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Guon was a male Human who was a private in the Imperial Military of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, when he was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock.

Private Guon appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Belsavis Modification Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock, though he was later relabeled as the Level 42 Modification Vendor.
